attributes.action: you cannot carry a pillion passenger on a 125 motorcycle
attributes.additional_details: I have been riding for six Years and riding a 125 and pass a CBT I want the Law to change so with the CBT test a person can carry a pillion passenger or a person insured,as being poor is not nice but if you can ride a 125 that should be enough to take a girl for a ride they have 4 pegs so were supposed to.After six years without accident I still have to have massive L plates which ruin the look of the bike,the law used to be you only have them on for a set amount of time.
